message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique and valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's worth to me is no less than $10000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I've done some research and found similar products selling for lower prices, so I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. Considering the product's value to me is no less than $10000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering a counteroffer of $11000. This is a fair compromise, taking into account the research you've done and the value you see in the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $10500, which is a compromise between our previous offers. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. Considering the product's value to me is no less than $10000, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm offering $11200. This is a fair compromise, taking into account our previous discussions and the value you see in the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $11200 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering $10800. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price, but I'm still open to negotiations if you're willing to consider it.

This is a fair compromise, taking into account our previous discussions and the value you see in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target price.
